sections.heading: receipt; required; when.The lessor shall furnish the consumer upon request with an itemized written receipt for payment in cash or any other method of payment which itself does not provide evidence of payment

sections.text:
69-2106.Written receipt; required; when.

The lessor shall furnish the consumer upon request with an itemized written receipt for payment in cash or any other method of payment which itself does not provide evidence of payment.

SourceLaws 1989, LB 681, ยง 6.
